title: Calories in Mozzarella Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in mozzarella cheese per 100g serving, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Whole milk mozzarella cheese, fresh or low-moisture; standard commercial variety, unsalted unless noted.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by milk type (whole vs. skim), brand, moisture content, and aging; check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: 100g of whole milk mozzarella cheese provides ~300 kcal and ~22g protein.

label_note: Values mirror standard Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g mozzarella cheese?
faqs.a: Approximately 300 kcal for whole milk variety.

faqs.q: Is mozzarella cheese high in protein?
What's the fat content in mozzarella cheese?
faqs.a: Around 22g total fat, including 14g saturated, per 100g.
Low carbs at ~2.2g per 100g, mostly from natural milk sugars.

faqs.q: How does part-skim mozzarella compare calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Part-skim has ~250 kcal per 100g, lower fat than whole milk.
